Class AlienEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.examples.spaceinvaders.Entity
      • org.lwjgl.examples.spaceinvaders.AlienEntity

  • public class AlienEntity
extends Entity
    An entity which represents one of our space invader aliens.
